name: Legend of Heroes, The - Ao no Kiseki [PSP]
description:
Legend of Heroes: Ao no Kiseki Evolution is a RPG game developed by Nihon Falcom. It came out on 12-06-2014. It was published by Kadokawa Shoten. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Legend of Heroes: Ao no Kiseki Evolution on PS Vita.
